report_title: Rewterz Threat Alert Ramnit Malware Active IOCs
Rewterz Threat Alert Ramnit Malware Active IOCs
text: The Ramnit malware has numerous variants, which may individually be categorized as trojans, viruses, or worms. The first ramnit malware discovered in 2010 were viruses that infected exe, .dll , and html files found on a computer. Later variants included the ability to steal confidential data from the infected machine. Depending on the variants, Ramnit-infected machines can also be enslaved in a botnet.
